title: " The Dead " (Vite)
subtitle: A story about a real, really good car that came out for sale and the sad story behind it.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An unbelievable buyer who answers an unbelievable announcement in a paper presented to an old Corvette in exchange for a small price discovers that the car belongs to the seller's son who was killed in Vietnam, and is offered at a very low price because the bereaved mother has no evidence of the real value of the car.
